title: Game keeps freezing after 8.16 patch
body: Ingame usually at the start or near end my game will just freeze and if i click too much when it freezes my game screen turns white and says it's not responding. The only solution for me is to quit the game and rejoin again which takes 4-5min which is really annoying! It shouldnt be my internet because its around 100ms and fps is about 40-50. It happens in any mode and with any champions and i dont know because i do NOT want to get a leaverbuster due to this and my friends doesnt experience this. plz help.

replies.body: exact same thing happening to me except my screen just freezes, i can still move my cursor and hear ingame sounds but i cant alt tab or move and the game is just frozen, i have to manually shutdown my laptop and reboot which already takes around 10 minutes. ive already received a leaverbuster for this, very annoying and only started happening after patch 8.16

It's kinda hard to explain without boggling you...
What I've found works is : 
CTRL+DEL= Task Manager --> Alt+Tab and close Task Manager.
If you have another desktop open *CTRL+Windows+Right/left* switch to that --> right click on Taskbar and open Task Manager --> Force close the league client.. 
Then go back to your first desktop and reconnect to the game

We'll just have to bear this until *HOPEFULLY* the fix comes 
I'm sorry if you don't understand me... I honestly hope Rito fixes this :(
